turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi. Yeah, I'm trying to order two pizzas from Bella Luna.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what kind of toppings would you like to add?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: All right, for the first one, I would like half pepperoni, half veggie lover's.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: And for the second one, I would like all meat lover.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: And for both pizzas, I would like them to be large and thick crust.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, let me repeat that order back to you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: 2 large, thick crust pizzas 1 half pepperoni, half veggie lovers, 1 all meat lover.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's it. Perfect.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, would you like to add anything else to that order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Nope, that's it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, the cost will be $46.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: All right. No problem.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your receipt will be texted to you.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: would you like to dine in, pick up, or have it delivered?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah. I'm going to go pick it up.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, let me see when it'll be ready for pick up.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: it will be ready in 25 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Perfect, thanks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help with anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's it. Have a great day.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, enjoy your pizza.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: (deleted)
